compliancy.name: Red Hat 5 STIG
compliancy.title: U.S. DISA Security Technical Implementation Guides
compliancy.abstract: The Security Technical Implementation Guides (STIGs) are the configuration standards for U.S. Department of Defense (DoD) Information Assurance (IA) and IA-enabled devices/systems. The guides are maintained and published by the Defense Information Systems Agencyâ€™s (DISA) Field Security Office (FSO).

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX001431
line-item.description: The /etc/gshadow file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX001432
line-item.description: The /etc/gshadow file must be group-owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX001433
line-item.description: The /etc/gshadow file must have mode 0400.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX001434
line-item.description: The /etc/gshadow file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX001476
line-item.description: The /etc/gshadow file must not contain any group password hashes.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00320
line-item.description: The system must not have special privilege accounts, such as shutdown and halt.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00360
line-item.description: The X server must have the correct options enabled.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00380
line-item.description: An X server must have none of the following options enabled: -ac, -core (except for debugging purposes), or -nolock.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00400
line-item.description: The /etc/access.conf file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00420
line-item.description: The /etc/access.conf file must have a privileged group owner.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00440
line-item.description: The /etc/security/access.conf file must have mode 0640 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00450
line-item.description: The access.conf file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00480
line-item.description: The /etc/sysctl.conf file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00500
line-item.description: The /etc/sysctl.conf file must be group-owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00520
line-item.description: The /etc/sysctl.conf file must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00530
line-item.description: The /etc/sysctl.conf file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00560
line-item.description: The Linux NFS Server must not have the insecure file locking option.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00580
line-item.description: The x86 CTRL-ALT-DELETE key sequence must be disabled.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00600
line-item.description: The Linux PAM system must not grant sole access to admin privileges to the first user who logs into the console.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00620
line-item.description: The /etc/securetty file must be group-owned by root, sys, or bin.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00640
line-item.description: The /etc/securetty file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00660
line-item.description: The /etc/securetty file must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00720
line-item.description: Auditing must be enabled at boot by setting a kernel parameter.

line-item.name: GEN000000-LNX00800
line-item.description: The system must use a Linux Security Module configured to limit the privileges of system services.

line-item.name: GEN000020
line-item.description: The system must require authentication upon booting into single-user and maintenance modes.

line-item.name: GEN000100
line-item.description: The operating system must be a supported release.

line-item.name: GEN000120
line-item.description: System security patches and updates must be installed and up-to-date.

line-item.name: GEN000140-2
line-item.description: A file integrity baseline including cryptographic hashes must be created.

line-item.name: GEN000140-3
line-item.description: A file integrity baseline including cryptographic hashes must be maintained.

line-item.name: GEN000220
line-item.description: A file integrity tool must be used at least weekly to check for unauthorized file changes, particularly the addition of unauthorized system libraries or binaries, or for unauthorized modification to authorized system libraries or binaries.

line-item.name: GEN000240
line-item.description: The system clock must be synchronized to an authoritative DoD time source.

line-item.name: GEN000241
line-item.description: The system clock must be synchronized continuously.

line-item.name: GEN000242
line-item.description: The system must use at least two time sources for clock synchronization.

line-item.name: GEN000244
line-item.description: The system must use time sources local to the enclave.

line-item.name: GEN000250
line-item.description: The time synchronization configuration file (such as /etc/ntp.conf) must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN000251
line-item.description: The time synchronization configuration file (such as /etc/ntp.conf) must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN000252
line-item.description: The time synchronization configuration file (such as /etc/ntp.conf) must have mode 0640 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN000253
line-item.description: The time synchronization configuration file (such as /etc/ntp.conf) must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN000280
line-item.description: Direct logins must not be permitted to shared, default, application, or utility accounts.

line-item.name: GEN000290
line-item.description: The system must not have unnecessary accounts.

line-item.name: GEN000290-1
line-item.description: The system must not have the unnecessary "games" account.

line-item.name: GEN000290-2
line-item.description: The system must not have the unnecessary "news" account.

line-item.name: GEN000290-3
line-item.description: The system must not have the unnecessary "gopher" account.

line-item.name: GEN000290-4
line-item.description: The system must not have the unnecessary "ftp" account.

line-item.name: GEN000300
line-item.description: All accounts on the system must have unique user or account names.

line-item.name: GEN000320
line-item.description: All accounts must be assigned unique User Identification Numbers (UIDs).

line-item.name: GEN000340
line-item.description: UIDs reserved for system accounts must not be assigned to non-system accounts.

line-item.name: GEN000360
line-item.description: GIDs reserved for system accounts must not be assigned to non-system groups.

line-item.name: GEN000380
line-item.description: All GIDs referenced in the /etc/passwd file must be defined in the /etc/group file.

line-item.name: GEN000400
line-item.description: The Department of Defense (DoD) login banner must be displayed immediately prior to, or as part of, console login prompts.

line-item.name: GEN000402
line-item.description: The Department of Defense (DoD) login banner must be displayed immediately prior to, or as part of, graphical desktop environment login prompts.

line-item.name: GEN000410
line-item.description: The FTPS/FTP service on the system must be configured with the Department of Defense (DoD) login banner.

line-item.name: GEN000440
line-item.description: Successful and unsuccessful logins and logouts must be logged.

line-item.name: GEN000450
line-item.description: The system must limit users to 10 simultaneous system logins, or a site-defined number, in accordance with operational requirements.

line-item.name: GEN000452
line-item.description: The system must display the date and time of the last successful account login upon login.

line-item.name: GEN000460
line-item.description: The system must disable accounts after three consecutive unsuccessful login attempts.

line-item.name: GEN000480
line-item.description: The delay between login prompts following a failed login attempt must be at least 4 seconds.

line-item.name: GEN000500
line-item.description: Graphical desktop environments provided by the system must automatically lock after 15 minutes of inactivity and the system must require users to re-authenticate to unlock the environment.

line-item.name: GEN000500-2
line-item.description: The graphical desktop environment must set the idle timeout to no more than 15 minutes.

line-item.name: GEN000500-3
line-item.description: Graphical desktop environments provided by the system must have automatic lock enabled.

line-item.name: GEN000510
line-item.description: The system must display a publicly-viewable pattern during a graphical desktop environment session lock.

line-item.name: GEN000520
line-item.description: The root user must not own the logon session for an application requiring a continuous display.

line-item.name: GEN000540
line-item.description: Users must not be able to change passwords more than once every 24 hours.

line-item.name: GEN000560
line-item.description: The system must not have accounts configured with blank or null passwords.

line-item.name: GEN000580
line-item.description: The system must require passwords contain a minimum of 15 characters.

line-item.name: GEN000585
line-item.description: The system must enforce compliance of the entire password during authentification.

line-item.name: GEN000590
line-item.description: The system must use a FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic hashing algorithm for generating account password hashes.

line-item.name: GEN000595
line-item.description: The password hashes stored on the system must have been generated using a FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic hashing algorithm.

line-item.name: GEN000600
line-item.description: The system must require passwords contain at least one uppercase alphabetic character.

line-item.name: GEN000600-2
line-item.description: Global settings defined in system-auth must be applied in the pam.d definition files.

line-item.name: GEN000610
line-item.description: The system must require passwords contain at least one lowercase alphabetic character.

line-item.name: GEN000620
line-item.description: The system must require passwords contain at least one numeric character.

line-item.name: GEN000640
line-item.description: The system must require passwords contain at least one special character.

line-item.name: GEN000680
line-item.description: The system must require passwords contain no more than three consecutive repeating characters.

line-item.name: GEN000700
line-item.description: User passwords must be changed at least every 60 days.

line-item.name: GEN000740
line-item.description: All non-interactive/automated processing account passwords must be changed at least once per year or be locked.

line-item.name: GEN000750
line-item.description: The system must require at least eight characters be changed between the old and new passwords during a password change.

line-item.name: GEN000760
line-item.description: Accounts must be locked upon 35 days of inactivity.

line-item.name: GEN000790
line-item.description: The system must prevent the use of dictionary words for passwords.

line-item.name: GEN000800
line-item.description: The system must prohibit the reuse of passwords within five iterations.

line-item.name: GEN000850
line-item.description: The system must restrict the ability to switch to the root user to members of a defined group.

line-item.name: GEN000880
line-item.description: The root account must be the only account having a UID of 0.

line-item.name: GEN000900
line-item.description: The root user's home directory must not be the root directory (/).

line-item.name: GEN000920
line-item.description: The root account's home directory (other than /) must have mode 0700.

line-item.name: GEN000930
line-item.description: The root account's home directory must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN000940
line-item.description: The root account's executable search path must be the vendor default and must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN000945
line-item.description: The root account's library search path must be the system default and must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN000950
line-item.description: The root account's list of preloaded libraries must be empty.

line-item.name: GEN000960
line-item.description: The root account must not have world-writable directories in its executable search path.

line-item.name: GEN000980
line-item.description: The system must prevent the root account from directly logging in except from the system console.

line-item.name: GEN001000
line-item.description: Remote consoles must be disabled or protected from unauthorized access.

line-item.name: GEN001020
line-item.description: The root account must not be used for direct log in.

line-item.name: GEN001060
line-item.description: The system must log successful and unsuccessful access to the root account.

line-item.name: GEN001080
line-item.description: The root shell must be located in the / file system.

line-item.name: GEN001100
line-item.description: Root passwords must never be passed over a network in clear text form.

line-item.name: GEN001120
line-item.description: The system must not permit root logins using remote access programs such as ssh.

line-item.name: GEN001140
line-item.description: System files and directories must not have uneven access permissions.

line-item.name: GEN001160
line-item.description: All files and directories must have a valid owner.

line-item.name: GEN001170
line-item.description: All files and directories must have a valid group-owner.

line-item.name: GEN001180
line-item.description: All network services daemon files must have mode 0755 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001190
line-item.description: All network services daemon files must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN001200
line-item.description: All system command files must have mode 0755 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001210
line-item.description: All system command files must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN001220
line-item.description: All system files, programs, and directories must be owned by a system account.

line-item.name: GEN001240
line-item.description: System files, programs, and directories must be group-owned by a system group.

line-item.name: GEN001260
line-item.description: System log files must have mode 0640 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001270
line-item.description: System log files must not have extended ACLs, except as needed to support authorized software.

line-item.name: GEN001280
line-item.description: Manual page files must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001290
line-item.description: All manual page files must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN001300
line-item.description: Library files must have mode 0755 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001310
line-item.description: All library files must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN001320
line-item.description: NIS/NIS+/yp files must be owned by root, sys, or bin.

line-item.name: GEN001340
line-item.description: NIS/NIS+/yp files must be group-owned by root, sys, or bin.

line-item.name: GEN001360
line-item.description: The NIS/NIS+/yp command files must have mode 0755 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001361
line-item.description: NIS/NIS+/yp command files must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN001362
line-item.description: The /etc/resolv.conf file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN001363
line-item.description: The /etc/resolv.conf file must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN001364
line-item.description: The /etc/resolv.conf file must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001365
line-item.description: The /etc/resolv.conf file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN001366
line-item.description: The /etc/hosts file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN001367
line-item.description: The /etc/hosts file must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN001368
line-item.description: The /etc/hosts file must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001369
line-item.description: The /etc/hosts file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN001371
line-item.description: The /etc/nsswitch.conf file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN001372
line-item.description: The /etc/nsswitch.conf file must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN001373
line-item.description: The /etc/nsswitch.conf file must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001374
line-item.description: The /etc/nsswitch.conf file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN001375
line-item.description: For systems using DNS resolution, at least two name servers must be configured.

line-item.name: GEN001378
line-item.description: The /etc/passwd file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN001379
line-item.description: The /etc/passwd file must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN001380
line-item.description: The /etc/passwd file must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001390
line-item.description: The /etc/passwd file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN001391
line-item.description: The /etc/group file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN001392
line-item.description: The /etc/group file must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN001393
line-item.description: The /etc/group file must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001394
line-item.description: The /etc/group file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN001400
line-item.description: The /etc/shadow (or equivalent) file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN001410
line-item.description: The /etc/shadow file (or equivalent) must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN001420
line-item.description: The /etc/shadow (or equivalent) file must have mode 0400.

line-item.name: GEN001430
line-item.description: The /etc/shadow file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN001440
line-item.description: All interactive users must be assigned a home directory in the /etc/passwd file.

line-item.name: GEN001460
line-item.description: All interactive user home directories defined in the /etc/passwd file must exist.

line-item.name: GEN001470
line-item.description: The /etc/passwd file must not contain password hashes.

line-item.name: GEN001475
line-item.description: The /etc/group file must not contain any group password hashes.

line-item.name: GEN001480
line-item.description: All user home directories must have mode 0750 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001490
line-item.description: User home directories must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN001500
line-item.description: All interactive user home directories must be owned by their respective users.

line-item.name: GEN001520
line-item.description: All interactive user home directories must be group-owned by the home directory owner's primary group.

line-item.name: GEN001540
line-item.description: All files and directories contained in interactive user home directories must be owned by the home directory's owner.

line-item.name: GEN001550
line-item.description: All files and directories contained in user home directories must be group-owned by a group of which the home directory's owner is a member.

line-item.name: GEN001560
line-item.description: All files and directories contained in user home directories must have mode 0750 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001570
line-item.description: All files and directories contained in user home directories must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN001580
line-item.description: All run control scripts must have mode 0755 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001590
line-item.description: All run control scripts must have no extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN001600
line-item.description: Run control scripts' executable search paths must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN001605
line-item.description: Run control scripts' library search paths must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN001610
line-item.description: Run control scripts' lists of preloaded libraries must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN001640
line-item.description: Run control scripts must not execute world-writable programs or scripts.

line-item.name: GEN001660
line-item.description: All system start-up files must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN001680
line-item.description: All system start-up files must be group-owned by root, sys, bin, other, or system.

line-item.name: GEN001700
line-item.description: System start-up files must only execute programs owned by a privileged UID or an application.

line-item.name: GEN001720
line-item.description: All global initialization files must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001730
line-item.description: All global initialization files must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN001740
line-item.description: All global initialization files must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN001760
line-item.description: All global initialization files must be group-owned by root, sys, bin, other, system, or the system default.

line-item.name: GEN001780
line-item.description: Global initialization files must contain the "mesg -n" or "mesg n" commands.

line-item.name: GEN001800
line-item.description: All skeleton files (typically those in /etc/skel) must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001810
line-item.description: Skeleton files must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN001820
line-item.description: All skeleton files and directories (typically in /etc/skel) must be owned by root or bin.

line-item.name: GEN001830
line-item.description: All skeleton files (typically in /etc/skel) must be group-owned by root, bin, sys, system, or other.

line-item.name: GEN001840
line-item.description: All global initialization files' executable search paths must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN001845
line-item.description: Global initialization files' library search paths must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN001850
line-item.description: Global initialization files' lists of preloaded libraries must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN001860
line-item.description: All local initialization files must be owned by the home directorys user or root.

line-item.name: GEN001870
line-item.description: Local initialization files must be group-owned by the user's primary group or root.

line-item.name: GEN001880
line-item.description: All local initialization files must have mode 0740 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001890
line-item.description: Local initialization files must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN001900
line-item.description: All local initialization files' executable search paths must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN001901
line-item.description: Local initialization files' library search paths must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN001902
line-item.description: Local initialization files' lists of preloaded libraries must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN001940
line-item.description: User start-up files must not execute world-writable programs.

line-item.name: GEN001980
line-item.description: The .rhosts, .shosts, hosts.equiv, shosts.equiv, /etc/passwd, /etc/shadow, and/or /etc/group files must not contain a plus (+) without defining entries for NIS+ netgroups.

line-item.name: GEN002000
line-item.description: There must be no .netrc files on the system.

line-item.name: GEN002020
line-item.description: All .rhosts, .shosts, or host.equiv files must only contain trusted host-user pairs.

line-item.name: GEN002040
line-item.description: There must be no .rhosts, .shosts, hosts.equiv, or shosts.equiv files on the system.

line-item.name: GEN002060
line-item.description: All .rhosts, .shosts, .netrc, or hosts.equiv files must be accessible by only root or the owner.

line-item.name: GEN002100
line-item.description: The .rhosts file must not be supported in PAM.

line-item.name: GEN002120
line-item.description: The /etc/shells (or equivalent) file must exist.

line-item.name: GEN002140
line-item.description: All shells referenced in /etc/passwd must be listed in the /etc/shells file, except any shells specified for the purpose of preventing logins.

line-item.name: GEN002200
line-item.description: All shell files must be owned by root or bin.

line-item.name: GEN002210
line-item.description: All shell files must be group-owned by root, bin, sys, or system.

line-item.name: GEN002220
line-item.description: All shell files must have mode 0755 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN002230
line-item.description: All shell files must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN002260
line-item.description: The system must be checked for extraneous device files at least weekly.

line-item.name: GEN002280
line-item.description: Device files and directories must only be writable by users with a system account or as configured by the vendor.

line-item.name: GEN002300
line-item.description: Device files used for backup must only be readable and/or writable by root or the backup user.

line-item.name: GEN002320
line-item.description: Audio devices must have mode 0660 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN002330
line-item.description: Audio devices must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN002340
line-item.description: Audio devices must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN002360
line-item.description: Audio devices must be group-owned by root, sys, bin, or system.

line-item.name: GEN002380
line-item.description: The owner, group-owner, mode, ACL, and location of files with the setuid bit set must be documented using site-defined procedures.

line-item.name: GEN002400
line-item.description: The system must be checked weekly for unauthorized setuid files as well as unauthorized modification to authorized setuid files.

line-item.name: GEN002420
line-item.description: Removable media, remote file systems, and any file system not containing approved setuid files must be mounted with the "nosuid" option.

line-item.name: GEN002430
line-item.description: Removable media, remote file systems, and any file system not containing approved device files must be mounted with the "nodev" option.

line-item.name: GEN002440
line-item.description: The owner, group-owner, mode, ACL and location of files with the setgid bit set must be documented using site-defined procedures.

line-item.name: GEN002460
line-item.description: The system must be checked weekly for unauthorized setgid files as well as unauthorized modification to authorized setgid files.

line-item.name: GEN002480
line-item.description: Public directories must be the only world-writable directories and world-writable files must be located only in public directories.

line-item.name: GEN002500
line-item.description: The sticky bit must be set on all public directories.

line-item.name: GEN002520
line-item.description: All public directories must be owned by root or an application account.

line-item.name: GEN002540
line-item.description: All public directories must be group-owned by root, sys, bin, or an application group.

line-item.name: GEN002560
line-item.description: The system and user default umask must be 077.

line-item.name: GEN002640
line-item.description: Default system accounts must be disabled or removed.

line-item.name: GEN002660
line-item.description: Auditing must be implemented.

line-item.name: GEN002680
line-item.description: System audit logs must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN002690
line-item.description: System audit logs must be group-owned by root, bin, sys, or system.

line-item.name: GEN002700
line-item.description: System audit logs must have mode 0640 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN002710
line-item.description: All system audit files must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN002715
line-item.description: System audit tool executables must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN002716
line-item.description: System audit tool executables must be group-owned by root, bin, sys, or system.

line-item.name: GEN002717
line-item.description: System audit tool executables must have mode 0750 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN002718
line-item.description: System audit tool executables must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN002719
line-item.description: The audit system must alert the SA in the event of an audit processing failure.

line-item.name: GEN002720
line-item.description: The audit system must be configured to audit failed attempts to access files and programs.

line-item.name: GEN002720-2
line-item.description: The audit system must be configured to audit failed attempts to access files and programs.

line-item.description: The SSH daemon must use privilege separation.

line-item.name: GEN005538
line-item.description: The SSH daemon must not allow rhosts RSA authentication.

line-item.name: GEN005539
line-item.description: The SSH daemon must not allow compression or must only allow compression after successful authentication.

line-item.name: GEN005540
line-item.description: The SSH daemon must be configured for IP filtering.

line-item.name: GEN005550
line-item.description: The SSH daemon must be configured with the Department of Defense (DoD) logon banner.

line-item.name: GEN005560
line-item.description: The system must be configured with a default gateway for IPv4 if the system uses IPv4, unless the system is a router.

line-item.name: GEN005570
line-item.description: The system must be configured with a default gateway for IPv6 if the system uses IPv6, unless the system is a router.

line-item.name: GEN005580
line-item.description: A system used for routing must not run other network services or applications.

line-item.name: GEN005590
line-item.description: The system must not be running any routing protocol daemons, unless the system is a router.

line-item.name: GEN005600
line-item.description: IP forwarding for IPv4 must not be enabled, unless the system is a router.

line-item.name: GEN005610
line-item.description: The system must not have IP forwarding for IPv6 enabled, unless the system is an IPv6 router.

line-item.name: GEN005740
line-item.description: The Network File System (NFS) export configuration file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN005750
line-item.description: The Network File System (NFS) export configuration file must be group-owned by root, bin, sys, or system.

line-item.name: GEN005760
line-item.description: The Network File System (NFS) export configuration file must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN005770
line-item.description: The Network File System (NFS) exports configuration file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN005800
line-item.description: All Network File System (NFS) exported system files and system directories must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN005810
line-item.description: All Network File System (NFS) exported system files and system directories must be group-owned by root, bin, sys, or system.

line-item.name: GEN005820
line-item.description: The Network File System (NFS) anonymous UID and GID must be configured to values without permissions.

line-item.name: GEN005840
line-item.description: The Network File System (NFS) server must be configured to restrict file system access to local hosts.

line-item.name: GEN005880
line-item.description: The Network File System (NFS) server must not allow remote root access.

line-item.name: GEN005900
line-item.description: The "nosuid" option must be enabled on all Network File System (NFS) client mounts.

line-item.name: GEN006000
line-item.description: The system must not have a public Instant Messaging (IM) client installed.

line-item.name: GEN006040
line-item.description: The system must not have any peer-to-peer file-sharing application installed.

line-item.name: GEN006060
line-item.description: The system must not run Samba unless needed.

line-item.name: GEN006080
line-item.description: The Samba Web Administration Tool (SWAT) must be restricted to the local host or require SSL.

line-item.name: GEN006100
line-item.description: The /etc/smb.conf file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN006120
line-item.description: The /etc/smb.conf file must be group-owned by root, bin, sys, or system.

line-item.name: GEN006140
line-item.description: The /etc/smb.conf file must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN006150
line-item.description: The /etc/smb.conf file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN006160
line-item.description: The /etc/smbpasswd file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN006180
line-item.description: The smbpasswd file must be group-owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN006200
line-item.description: The smbpasswd file must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN006210
line-item.description: The /etc/smbpasswd file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN006220
line-item.description: The smb.conf file must use the "hosts" option to restrict access to Samba.

line-item.name: GEN006225
line-item.description: Samba must be configured to use an authentication mechanism other than "share."

line-item.name: GEN006230
line-item.description: Samba must be configured to use encrypted passwords.

line-item.name: GEN006235
line-item.description: Samba must be configured to not allow guest access to shares.

line-item.name: GEN006240
line-item.description: The system must not run an Internet Network News (INN) server.

line-item.name: GEN006260
line-item.description: The /etc/news/incoming.conf (or equivalent) must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN006270
line-item.description: The /etc/news/incoming.conf file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN006280
line-item.description: The /etc/news/infeed.conf (or equivalent) must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN006290
line-item.description: The /etc/news/hosts.nntp.nolimit file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN006300
line-item.description: The /etc/news/readers.conf (or equivalent) must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN006310
line-item.description: The /etc/news/nnrp.access file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN006320
line-item.description: The /etc/news/passwd.nntp file (or equivalent) must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN006330
line-item.description: The /etc/news/passwd.nntp file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN006340
line-item.description: Files in /etc/news must be owned by root or news.

line-item.name: GEN006360
line-item.description: The files in /etc/news must be group-owned by root or news.

line-item.name: GEN006380
line-item.description: The system must not use UDP for NIS/NIS+.

line-item.name: GEN006400
line-item.description: The Network Information System (NIS) protocol must not be used.

line-item.name: GEN006420
line-item.description: NIS maps must be protected through hard-to-guess domain names.

line-item.name: GEN006480
line-item.description: The system must have a host-based intrusion detection tool installed.

line-item.name: GEN006560
line-item.description: The system vulnerability assessment tool, host-based intrusion detection tool, and file integrity tool must notify the SA and the IAO of a security breach or a suspected security breach.

line-item.name: GEN006565
line-item.description: The system package management tool must be used to verify system software periodically.

line-item.name: GEN006570
line-item.description: The file integrity tool must be configured to verify ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN006571
line-item.description: The file integrity tool must be configured to verify extended attributes.

line-item.name: GEN006575
line-item.description: The file integrity tool must use FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic hashes for validating file contents.

line-item.name: GEN006580
line-item.description: The system must use an access control program.

line-item.name: GEN006600
line-item.description: The system's access control program must log each system access attempt.

line-item.name: GEN006620
line-item.description: The system's access control program must be configured to grant or deny system access to specific hosts.

line-item.name: GEN006640
line-item.description: The system must use and update a DoD-approved virus scan program.

line-item.name: GEN006600
line-item.description: Accounts must be locked upon 35 days of inactivity.

line-item.name: GEN007020
line-item.description: The Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) must be disabled unless required.

line-item.name: GEN007080
line-item.description: The Datagram Congestion Control Protocol (DCCP) must be disabled unless required.

line-item.name: GEN007260
line-item.description: The AppleTalk protocol must be disabled or not installed.

line-item.name: GEN007480
line-item.description: The Reliable Datagram Sockets (RDS) protocol must be disabled or not installed unless required.

line-item.name: GEN007540
line-item.description: The Transparent Inter-Process Communication (TIPC) protocol must be disabled or uninstalled.

line-item.name: GEN007660
line-item.description: The Bluetooth protocol handler must be disabled or not installed.

line-item.name: GEN007700
line-item.description: The IPv6 protocol handler must not be bound to the network stack unless needed.

line-item.name: GEN007720
line-item.description: The IPv6 protocol handler must be prevented from dynamic loading unless needed.

line-item.name: GEN007780
line-item.description: The system must not have 6to4 enabled.

line-item.name: GEN007800
line-item.description: The system must not have Teredo enabled.

line-item.name: GEN007820
line-item.description: The system must not have IP tunnels configured.

line-item.name: GEN007840
line-item.description: The DHCP client must be disabled if not needed.

line-item.name: GEN007850
line-item.description: The DHCP client must not send dynamic DNS updates.

line-item.name: GEN007860
line-item.description: The system must ignore IPv6 ICMP redirect messages.

line-item.name: GEN007920
line-item.description: The system must not forward IPv6 source-routed packets.

line-item.name: GEN007950
line-item.description: The system must not respond to ICMPv6 echo requests sent to a broadcast address.

line-item.name: GEN007960
line-item.description: The 'ldd' command must be disabled unless it protects against the execution of untrusted files.

line-item.name: GEN007980
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the system must use a TLS connection using FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic algorithms.

line-item.name: GEN008000
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, certificates used to authenticate to the LDAP server must be provided from DoD PKI or a DoD-approved external PKI.

line-item.name: GEN008020
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the LDAP TLS connection must require the server provide a certificate with a valid trust path to a trusted CA.

line-item.name: GEN008040
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the system must verify the LDAP server's certificate has not been revoked.

line-item.name: GEN008050
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the /etc/ldap.conf file (or equivalent) must not contain passwords.

line-item.name: GEN008060
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information the /etc/ldap.conf (or equivalent) file must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN008080
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the /etc/ldap.conf (or equivalent) file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN008100
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the /etc/ldap.conf (or equivalent) file must be group-owned by root, bin, sys, or system.

line-item.name: GEN008120
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the /etc/ldap.conf (or equivalent) file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN008140
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the TLS certificate authority file and/or directory (as appropriate) must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN008160
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the TLS certificate authority file and/or directory (as appropriate) must be group-owned by root, bin, sys, or system.

line-item.name: GEN008180
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the TLS certificate authority file and/or directory (as appropriate) must have mode 0644 (0755 for directories) or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN008200
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the LDAP TLS certificate authority file and/or directory (as appropriate) must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN008220
line-item.description: For systems using NSS LDAP, the TLS certificate file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN008240
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the LDAP TLS certificate file must be group-owned by root, bin, sys, or system.

line-item.name: GEN008260
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the LDAP TLS certificate file must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN008280
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the LDAP TLS certificate file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN008300
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the LDAP TLS key file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN008320
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the LDAP TLS key file must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN008340
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the LDAP TLS key file must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN008360
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the LDAP TLS key file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN008380
line-item.description: A root kit check tool must be run on the system at least weekly.

line-item.name: GEN008420
line-item.description: The system must use available memory address randomization techniques.

line-item.name: GEN008440
line-item.description: Automated file system mounting tools must not be enabled unless needed.

line-item.name: GEN008460
line-item.description: The system must have USB disabled unless needed.

line-item.name: GEN008480
line-item.description: The system must have USB Mass Storage disabled unless needed.

line-item.name: GEN008500
line-item.description: The system must have IEEE 1394 (Firewire) disabled unless needed.

line-item.name: GEN008520
line-item.description: The system must employ a local firewall.

line-item.name: GEN008540
line-item.description: The system's local firewall must implement a deny-all, allow-by-exception policy.

line-item.name: GEN008600
line-item.description: The system must be configured to only boot from the system boot device.

line-item.name: GEN008620
line-item.description: System BIOS or system controllers supporting password protection must have administrator accounts/passwords configured, and no others.

line-item.name: GEN008640
line-item.description: The system must not use removable media as the boot loader.

line-item.name: GEN008660
line-item.description: For systems capable of using GRUB, the system must be configured with GRUB as the default boot loader unless another boot loader has been authorized, justified, and documented using site-defined procedures.

line-item.name: GEN008680
line-item.description: If the system boots from removable media, it must be stored in a safe or similarly secured container.

line-item.name: GEN008700
line-item.description: The system boot loader must require authentication.

line-item.name: GEN008710
line-item.description: The system boot loader must protect passwords using an MD5 or stronger cryptographic hash.

line-item.name: GEN008720
line-item.description: The system's boot loader configuration file(s) must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN008740
line-item.description: The system's boot loader configuration file(s) must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN008760
line-item.description: The system's boot loader configuration files must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN008780
line-item.description: The system's boot loader configuration file(s) must be group-owned by root, bin, sys, or system.

line-item.name: GEN008800
line-item.description: The system package management tool must cryptographically verify the authenticity of software packages during installation.

line-item.name: GEN008820
line-item.description: The system package management tool must not automatically obtain updates.

line-item.name: GEN009120
line-item.description: The system, if capable, must be configured to require the use of a CAC, PIV compliant hardware token, or Alternate Logon Token (ALT) for authentication.

line-item.name: GEN006660
line-item.description: Accounts must be locked upon 35 days of inactivity.

line-item.name: GEN005527
line-item.description: The SSH daemon must not allow host-based authentication.

line-item.name: GEN001025
line-item.description: The sudo command must require authentication.
